mil3.1.9:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.1.9:0.3_0: For this is the mark of virtue.
mil3.1.9:1.2_0: “But that Reverend Bakkula’s barber, what do you think skillful qualities?”
mil3.1.9:1.3_0: “Great king, mindfulness, immersion, and skillful qualities.”
mil3.1.9:1.5_0: “Great king, this is the majority of energy, all of the skillful qualities that are produced by developing and cultivating mindfulness meditation. They develop the faculty of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.”
mil3.1.9:2.2_0: “All the plants and seeds that achieve growth, increase, and maturity do so depending on the earth and grounded on the earth.
mil3.1.9:2.3_0: In the same way, the faculty of ethics is grounded on ethics, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.”
mil3.1.9:3.2_0: “Great king, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
mil3.1.9:3.3_0: In the same way, the faculty of ethics is grounded on ethics, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.”
mil3.1.9:4.2_0: “Great king, as he wanted to sweep away the city, he’d carry around him to spend the city. He had the palaces, removed a thorn, made of a thorn boat, and split open the wall.
mil3.1.9:4.3_0: In the same way, the faculty of ethics is grounded on ethics, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.”
mil3.1.9:5.2_0: “Great king, as they wanted to tender, I’d give it to remove the earth, whirlpools, and threw the ground to the ground.
mil3.1.9:5.3_0: In the same way, the faculty of faith, ethics, immersion, and wisdom depending on and grounded on ethics.
mil3.1.9:5.4_0: I have been spoken by the Buddha, great king, and
mil3.1.9:6.1_0: A wise man grounded in ethics,
mil3.1.9:7.4_0: heats the entire spectrum of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.’”
mil3.1.9:9.1_0: The ninth characteristics of ethical conduct.
